title: Malaysia’s ex-prime minister Najib Razak finally goes to jail
dc:creator: Arno Maierbrugger
description:
Najib Razak, prime minister of Malaysia between 2009 and 2018, has finally been sent to jail to start serving a 12-year sentence for his role in the massive corruption scandal involving the country’s state-owned wealth fund 1Malaysia Development Berhad, or

The post Malaysia’s ex-prime minister Najib Razak finally goes to jail appeared first on Investvine.
